99407765-8f66-4053-b8aa-42ed3da9e3b4: A lonely mercenary who had lost all hope of rescue will meet you on this island. He will be happy to join your expedition.
f4851864-5faa-449a-a266-7799035ee659: All barbarians, bloodragers, skalds with the battle scion archetype, and druids with the primal druid archetype in your party gain an additional +5 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} every time they gain a level.
7db055bc-7f0f-40da-97d0-9bd503cb8870: All elves in your party gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}.
e0d0a1d0-3767-4a21-81c4-5c3c444427b8: All kitsune in your party gain a permanent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} score equal to half their {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} (rounded down).
83dfa8e1-bceb-44f4-ab21-fb67d4d06e8b: All party members gain Shield Bash as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} at 1st level, even if they do not meet the prerequisites. Any character who is using a shield gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. While performing a shield bash, a character gains a +6 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}. On a hit, the attack deals bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to the character's level.
d1ca026f-625e-40e3-9106-180f40e31aee: All party members gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character levels{/g} (minimum +1) to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g} weapons.
e0bd03d6-543e-4768-b82f-8bb0b79d4369: All party members gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character levels{/g} (minimum +1) to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing{/g} weapons.
2853583a-5a59-47e1-bb1e-d34d51405905: All ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} made by your party members have a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}threat range{/g} of 17–20.
e5fb0226-661e-4340-9160-5e170b057c6b: All rogues, rangers, alchemists with the vivisectionist archetype, magi with the armored battlemage archetype, and slayers with the arcane enforcer archetype gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/- equal to their level in this class.
b3b2eed3-2366-4c1c-bc8a-b722c0f817e7: All {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} dealt by your party members is increased by 25%.
d60486fa-cebd-445e-9656-1ffb04d0dad1: All {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} dealt by your party members is increased by 25%.
d5f1f475-a750-4347-99ac-b9df48de43ba: All {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} dealt by your party members is increased by 25%.
1787cf21-e392-483c-ab7c-cabe05ff43ff: All {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} dealt by your party members is increased by 25%.
ba395a07-a088-48e7-bece-5e694dbfb387: All {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} made by your party members when using a bow gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 for every other bow-wielding party member attacking the same target, up to a maximum of +3.
4200b7cf-83b2-4ee4-9a46-4f4e219e3829: An alchemically quickened creature suffers from bouts of mania. It gets a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. Whenever creature moves 10 feet or more, it gains the effects of the {g|SpellsBlur}blur{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
d38a1014-95a4-492d-a95a-015d21021efe: Characters of certain archetypes with a special connection to nature gain the ability to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} their allies. This tailwind works with the following classes: druid with the primal druid archetype, inquisitor with the sacred huntsmaster archetype, rogue with the sylvan trickster archetype, skald with the hunt caller archetype, sorcerer with the sylvan sorcerer archetype, warpriest with the feral champion archetype. Every time your party kills an enemy, all party members are healed by an amount based on how many different archetypes from the above list are represented in the party: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} if one, 1d6 per character level if two, 1d8 per character level if three, 1d10 per character level if four, 1d12 per character level if five, 2d8 per character level if all six.
d7332211-94b8-4bf6-8ba4-e080b91f5d90: Each dwarf in your party gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} for each dwarf in your party, including themselves.
9dbcb1c8-c4be-4ca8-bc6f-30cce2791f4c: Each member of your party permanently gains an effect that increases by 25% all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} they deal with one randomly chosen element from the following list: acid, cold, electricity, fire, sound.
a5b6ee57-26df-479c-ab37-b214cf62d87d: Every halfling in your party gains additional feat and +1 to all his saving throws
8656962c-b200-45d4-9af0-01f24d1ba0a3:
Every time a divine caster in your party casts a divine {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} on a party member, they grant that party member an additional blessing. The nature of the blessing depends on their deity's {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
A follower of a good deity grants their party members a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
A follower of a neutral deity grants their party members a luck bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
A follower of an evil deity grants their party members a profane bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
a6af3080-1ba5-4259-80a3-f5a7518913cf: Every time a spontaneous spellcaster in your party casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, they have a 50% chance to avoid expending a spell slot.
133fc98a-07bb-47b0-87a6-af42f49b0054: Every time any cleric, inquisitor, oracle, or warpriest in your party casts a divine {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, it becomes empowered, as though using the {g|FeatureEmpoweredSpell}Empower Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
6fdaeac1-907c-466b-9fbe-904d9c4b3c09: Every time one of your party members casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, they gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to the spell's level on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} on their next weapon attack. Multiple applications of this effect stack, but its duration cannot exceed 1 minute.
f5ac671c-8b6d-4bcf-939a-fc5121198164: Every time one of your party members summons exactly one creature, two such creatures are summoned instead.
04a1f7dd-b93d-4180-b5ee-647cc5914aa2: Having braved this island, you and your entire party will gain a random positive effect until the end of the expedition.
f5f4a110-7eab-46eb-8bd2-ee66097162cc: Having braved this island, you and your entire party will gain a random {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
7b271589-c54a-432a-a1f7-dc0820cc3b4a: Having braved this island, you and your entire party will permanently gain 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}.
4a5811ef-dd34-44a7-9f8f-4171b5c1f807: Having braved this island, you and your entire party will permanently gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to a random {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}.
b0519955-3bc2-4237-8344-c2219824ebcf: Having braved this island, you and your entire party will permanently gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to a random {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}.
9a2b1bba-75f5-436f-8ee9-ed1da341c108: Having braved this island, you and your entire party will permanently gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}.
d3bac665-cb3b-4baa-9f88-866216f90f71: Pirates have settled on this island. If you want to find treasure, you should visit this place.
ab6fcb68-ccd0-4ec2-8574-4e0d1951424b: Pirates stash their ill-gotten gains on this island. Paying them a visit might net you a fortune — but don't expect them to give it away easily!
abacafe3-ce1c-48a0-a2a6-749a070da957: Some spellcasters in your party are protected from harming their allies. Clerics with the ecclesitheurge archetype, druids with the elemental rampager archetype, magi with the eldritch scion archetype, sorcerers with the overwhelming mage archetype, witches with the elemental witch archetype, and wizards with the elemental specialist archetype can cast area of effect {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} without harming their party members. In addition, whenever a member of your party would be struck by such a spell, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} 10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} against the spells from the same school for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
739c5d29-fa04-4ef6-85e2-80550a72a57d: The blasts of all kineticists in your party rebound off enemies, hitting additional targets. For every two kineticist levels, each blast hits one extra target.
3d653ccb-1309-434a-9171-c1fe714a2f67: The effects of some of the bardic songs stack. This includes: Inspire Courage, Inspire Greatness, Inspire Heroics.
5b5f9bda-5bb6-4c28-a581-758d7197053c: The horrid abyssal radiation makes this creature stronger. It gains a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +20 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of its {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities is increased by 10. This effect stacks with other abyssal radiation effects.
10c9c896-5b75-46f4-9a0f-0be44f1de0c7: The horrid abyssal radiation makes this creature stronger. It gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +4 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of its {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities is increased by 2. This effect stacks with other abyssal radiation effects.
8990336c-a315-4433-9876-422c42b1ad5b: The horrid abyssal radiation makes this creature stronger. It gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +8 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of its {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities is increased by 4. This effect stacks with other abyssal radiation effects.
6b9d125b-f6a9-414b-babc-d460cff7012e: The horrid abyssal radiation makes this creature stronger. It gains a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +12 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of its {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities is increased by 6. This effect stacks with other abyssal radiation effects.
707eb0b6-6334-46fb-a33a-d1f5b866e244: The horrid abyssal radiation makes this creature stronger. It gains a +8 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +16 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of its {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities is increased by 8. This effect stacks with other abyssal radiation effects.
21f8d90b-f571-496e-82fa-6438409e81ab: The next character to set sail on the ship will receive an additional level at the start.
789e249d-bde8-4c46-b291-1e50828e6f49: The special aura of this island will allow you to clear the effect of Abyssal corruption while {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}resting{/g}.
620945d0-ec65-41e5-a2b9-1e43833726b9: There is an old pirate's cache on this island. You will find a lot of gold here.
9cae1315-cb75-4926-a0f5-939229eeaed4: This creature is incredibly difficult to harm. It gains mythic rank, energy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 15 against all types of energy, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} 15/epic, a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its natural armor, and the first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against this creature does not deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. In addition, whenever the creature makes a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}, it {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} two times and takes the best result.
6df04e7e-1f43-4d52-977e-ac09210cce19: This creature is larger and stronger than its normal-sized counterparts. It gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +3 bonus to its natural armor and a –2 size {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} (to a minimum of 1). Melee and ranged weapons used by this creature deal more {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
c1534ab5-1f73-4e89-9dec-e037cc651e52: This creature was nourished with the power of Nahyndrian crystal. It is fast and deadly, and has incredible speed and agility. The creature gains 2 mythic ranks, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} and +1 dodge bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. Also it gains an evasion ability and its {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by 30 feet, to a maximum of twice the creature's base speed. In addition, whenever the creature makes an initiative {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, it {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} two times and takes the best result.
1c182525-f586-4967-91c9-177f89711516: This island holds a lot of secrets and dangers. You will get additional {g|Encyclopedia:XP}experience points{/g} for conquering it.
9db6e7cf-4dfa-4e87-a42d-44ed906bd732: This island holds a special treasure — a unique magical item.
fbdc898f-6310-490a-80b1-ab9cce9b3a83: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. All creatures on this island are under the constant effect of the {g|SpellsEnlargePerson}enlarge person{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} scores of all creatures on the island are increased to 21 if their original values were lower.
a2e8226d-d4b7-4583-8763-826703be663e: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. All creatures on this island go into a rage similar to a barbarian's rage. They gain a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}, and a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. They can't use their {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} to hide, but they can cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} as usual. In addition, whenever a creature on this island kills an enemy, it gains a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} and becomes enlarged, as per {g|SpellsEnlargePerson}enlarge person{/g} spell, for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
60f77f7a-080c-4f1b-a8e4-41c6ccf1c21d: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Any creature here gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} if it is of {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}chaotic neutral alignment{/g}. If its alignment matches chaotic neutral along one axis only, it gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls.
56712dd1-0b21-4183-a252-469ebd1e8f22: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Every creature on this island suffers a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}. Every time it fails a Will saving throw it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}force damage{/g}. This effect can be removed by a {g|SpellsDispelMagic}dispel magic{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
4868fc53-9fd1-476f-844d-4a31824eec76:
This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Negative energy permeates this island.
In areas where its presence is strongest, all {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} done with positive energy is reduced by 50%. All healing done with negative energy on this island is increased by 50%.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of all Necromancy school {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} is increased by 1.
All undead and dhampirs gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and their maximum number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is increased by 2 per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}HD{/g}. In addition, every time such a creature deals damage, it restores its lost hit points equal to the amount of 20% of the damage dealt.
60bea855-d2b4-48b9-8899-279b1a6bd754: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Some creatures on this island are under the hypnotic control of a mind dominator. If the mind dominator is killed, those creatures will be released and aid you in battle.
9de85979-406a-42c6-ad03-1ed40feaf9b3: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. The air is infused with raw, unbridled magic. The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic descriptor is increased by 2. Whenever a creature casts an arcane spell, a tiny magic eater pseudodragon appears out of thin air next to the caster and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} them. Whenever the magic eater hits the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating). On a failed save, the magic eater affects the target with an effect that reduces the caster level of all spells cast by the target. Multiple applications of this effect stack. This effect can be removed by a {g|SpellsRestoration}restoration{/g} spell.
6b30585b-376b-4715-85f9-91f121039d61:
This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. The elements, tainted by the energies of the Abyss, rage on this island.
Roaring gale: all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} made against targets more than 30 feet away suffer a -4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
Lightning strikes: periodically, a random creature on the island is struck by a lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}10d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} by half.
Whenever a creature on this island casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g}, that spell's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} is increased by 2.
bdb6ecd0-1c78-4a88-9a4b-49b444051345: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. The laws of magic on this island are peculiar. Every time a creature casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g}, or activates a magic item, it must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g} (the {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating). On a failed check, the spell is wasted, but another random spell is cast on the same target instead. If the caster is under the effect of the {g|SpellsProtectionFromChaos}protection from chaos{/g} spell when the check is failed, the spell is cast normally, but the protection from chaos is dispelled.
8e0e4c17-b537-49e3-ac4d-fd1c2e0f4fe2: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. This island is plagued by intense heat. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} is increased by 2, and all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on hit. In addition, creatures without {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire (including temporary immunity granted by effects such as a {g|SpellsProtectionFromEnergy}protection from energy{/g} spell) take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} whenever they cast a spell, and all medium and heavy armor they are wearing is red-hot, dealing damage to them each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Finally, pools of lava can be found on the island — a creature that steps into them takes 20d6 fire damage (a successful DC 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} reduces the damage by half).
9e4ef068-0484-44fb-8769-e280cd7ddfa2: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. This island is ravaged by cannibals and diseases. Every time a cannibal devours a corpse, they go into a rage similar to a barbarian's rage and gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good{/g}. In addition, every time an infectious creature hits with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating) or become infected with disease.
8cb3a262-510b-4330-90dd-e26e9daca3f6: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Time flows much more quickly on this island. At the beginning of each combat, all creatures are affected by the equivalent of the {g|SpellsHaste}haste{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. In addition, all creatures begin to age rapidly: at the beginning of each turn, each of them has its aging counter increased by 1. As they age, the creatures gain a stacking {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} and suffer a stacking {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. The effects of the accelerated aging are lifted once the party leaves the island. They can also be removed with a {g|SpellsRestorationGreater}greater restoration{/g} spell.
0d0d434f-a503-45ee-bf5e-2deafa98631c: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Whenever a creature with at least 3 levels in an arcane or divine spellcasting class casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, it must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating). On a failed save, the creature becomes {g|ConditionConfusion}confused{/g} and goes into a rage similar to a barbarian's rage for 1 minute. After the effect ends, the creature gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Will saves for 1 minute.
69e2f04d-e63e-42f4-b9f5-c3989553e424: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. You can find elemental pillars on it. A creature within a 30-foot range of a pillar gains cold {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} based on its {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}HD{/g} (resistance 10 for 6 HD, resistance 20 for 10 HD, and resistance 30 for 20 HD). Every time the creature takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from any source, it takes an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
68a24bcc-4fbb-4de8-9361-5a7115d990a7: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. You can find elemental pillars on it. All non-elemental creatures within a 30-foot range of a pillar become {g|ConditionSlowed}slowed{/g}, as per the {g|SpellsSlow}slow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, but also gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good{/g}. In addition, every time such a creature makes an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} or casts a spell, it must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 30) or fall {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}.
5a705ceb-e0ef-422b-ad1d-3a297c82ba16: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. You can find elemental pillars on it. Creatures within a 30-foot range of a pillar are protected from {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged{/g} weapon attacks, gaining a +4 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against them. However, they run the risk of getting hit by lightning.
b59e4cc5-6f9b-4fd1-9306-f4be98da8bcd: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. You can find elemental pillars on it. Creatures within a 30-foot range of a pillar gain fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 5. Periodically, whirlpools with a radius of 10 feet appear in random spots on the island, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} to all creatures caught in them.
05e1a7af-d918-468d-a56f-4192d79a3aee: When wielded by your party members, all {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}exotic weapons{/g} deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} using the damage die of the next highest category (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d10{/g} becomes a 2d8).
600f156d-309b-401a-876b-2c33dba53184:
Whenever a member of your party casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} on a target which is already under an effect of a spell from an antagonistic school, it causes an explosion which deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}force damage{/g} per spell level of the spell cast on a target.
The following {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}schools of magic{/g} are antagonistic to each other: Illusion and Necromancy; Enchantment and Evocation; Conjuration and Divination; Transmutation and Abjuration.
f28a2f0a-34aa-4db6-b9a5-345892046cab: You will be able to replenish supplies on this island. The mysterious merchant will readily offer you his goods at pleasing prices.
781f0684-10ad-431d-9837-5b427036b867: You will find a Nahyndrian crystal and increase your Mythic rank on this island.
d85888ee-0969-4b50-9f0e-54ad31899a6b: You will find a cursed potion or a cursed scroll and get a chance to acquire new powers on this island.
74fe6c16-2227-40e3-a0ee-5cdd7227026d: Your party starts with 5,000 gold. In addition, vendor prices are reduced by 10% for every gnome in your party.
188c7fe2-53ae-4be0-8ac2-80699bee5d66: {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}Arcane spell failure chance{/g} for wearing armor is reduced by 20% for you and your party members. Whenever a character successfully casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} despite there being a failure chance, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by this spell is increased by 3% for each 1% of that failure chance.
02ee105f-f607-4498-b4b0-75ab040773bf: {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}Unarmed strikes{/g} made by your party members gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die of the same type as the primary one ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} becomes 2d4, 1d6 becomes 2d6).
